meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>say</kanji>ing <kanji>way</kanji> is… your <vocabulary>way of saying</vocabulary>! This refers to the words you use and how you phrase things, as well as how you say it.
readingMnemonic: This uses the kun'yomi readings from the vocab words 言う and 方. So as long as you're okay with those, you can apply that knowledge over here.
